doc: A GtkRecentFilterInfo struct is used to pass information about the tested file to .

fields.doc: to indicate which fields are set.
fields.name: contains

fields.doc: The URI of the file being tested.
fields.name: uri

fields.doc: The string that will be used to display the file in the recent chooser.
fields.name: display_name

fields.doc: The list of applications that have registered the file.
fields.name: applications

fields.doc: The groups to which the file belongs to.
fields.name: groups

fields.doc: The number of days elapsed since the file has been registered.
fields.name: age

name: RecentFilterInfo
